Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th St./Racine
ShortDescription: EB 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via: 69th, Racine, 71st, Halsted and 69th. due to, street blockage, near 69th St./Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via: 69th, Racine, 71st, Halsted and 69th. due to, street blockage, near 69th St./Racine.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
